name: Alive (itch) (DexterEast)
description:
In a world where zombies exist. you think you are the last survivor, and you are probably right. With your trusty 9mm pistol, you fight the zombies that come attacking you.

-(Controls)-

WASD (Movement)

Space (Fire)

R (Reload)

Pro tip: you don't need to reload, it reloads automatically.

-(Notes)-

Please tell me how I can make this better ^-^

-(Credits)-

Credits are already in there
